data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Saint Mary, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint Mary, Antigua and Barbuda
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 5,586 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.
Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Saint Mary.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the state of Saint Mary against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Saint Mary, Antigua and Barbuda to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Saint Mary. Through your servants plant 1 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Saint Mary who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

data.section_summary:
the state of Saint Mary, Antigua and Barbuda has a population of 8,200.

We estimate Saint Mary has 2,034 people who might know Jesus, 5,586 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 580 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.
